titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 4(b) of rule XI with respect to consideration of a certain resolution reported from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-529, by Mr. Hall (OH).

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 168.

action.text: Waiving the requirment for a two-thirds vote to consider a report from the Committee on Rules on the same day it is presented to the House with respect to a resolution reported on the legislative day of May 25, 1994, providing for consideration of the bill H.R. 4426.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 246 - 174 (Roll no. 201).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/24/1994--Introduced. Waives provisions of rule XI of the Rules of the House of Representatives that require a two-thirds vote to consider a report from the Committee on Rules on the same day it is presented to the House with respect to resolutions reported from such Committee on May 25, 1994, providing for consideration of H.R. 4426 (making FY 1995 appropriations for foreign operations, export financing, and related programs).
